title.narrative: West Kalimantan Power Grid Strengthening Project

description.narrative: The proposed project is perfectly aligned with ADB's Energy Sector Assessment Strategy and Roadmap, which supports investment in strategic transmission assets that connects regions or countries across seas or international boundaries to optimize power networks by reducing the overall need for reserve capacity, improving system reliability, removing transmission bottlenecks, and transmitting cheaper power from one area to the other, addressing overall regional socio-economic and environmental improvement.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Cost of operating West Kalimantan power system reduced

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
In West Kalimantan, PLN's average cost of generation reduced to $0.18/kWh (2009 baseline: $0.25/kWh)
